metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18260 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Dolibarr ERP/CRM is affected by multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in versions through 7.0.0 via comm/propal/list.php (viewstatut parameter) or comm/propal/list.php (propal_statut parameter, aka search_statut parameter).

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
